abstract: Mexican tractor-trailer crosses border into the United States for first time under the North American Free Trade Agreement; trucking program had been stalled for years by American opponents who claimed it would put highway safety and American jobs at risk.
snippet: The Nafta trucking program had been stalled for years by American opponents who said it would put highway safety and American jobs at risk.
lead_paragraph: The Nafta trucking program had been stalled for years by American opponents who said it would put highway safety and American jobs at risk.

headline.main: Texas: First Mexican Truck Enters U.S. Under Nafta
headline.print_headline: Texas: First Mexican Truck Enters U.S. Under Nafta
headline.seo: In Texas, First Mexican Truck Enters U.S. Under Nafta
